roadmap_title: Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) Mastery Path ðŸ§

phases.focus: Efficiency, Low-Level Operations, and Basic Structures
topics: Time & Space Complexity (Big O, Big Theta, Big Omega)
Mathematics for DSA (GCD, LCM, Modular Arithmetic, Prime Sieve)
Bitwise Manipulation (AND, OR, XOR, Shifts, Bit Tricks)
Array and String theory
Recursion Basics: Base Case and Recursive Step
Linear Search and Binary Search (Iterative & Recursive)
Arrays: Two Pointers Technique
Arrays: Sliding Window Technique
Arrays: Prefix & Suffix Sums
Kadane's Algorithm (Maximum Subarray Sum)
Dutch National Flag (DNF) Algorithm (Sorting 0s, 1s, and 2s)
Sorting Algorithms (Merge, Quick, Heap, Counting, Radix, Bucket)
Binary Search Applications (Peak Element, Aggressive Cows, Allocate Books)
Linked Lists (Singly, Doubly, Circular)
Linked Lists: Reverse, Middle, Merge Two Sorted Lists
Linked Lists: Cycle Detection (Floydâ€™s Algorithm)
Stacks: Implementation and Applications (Next Greater Element, Valid Parentheses, Stock Span)
Queues: Simple, Circular, Deque, and Priority Queue
Hashing: Hash Map/Dictionary and Hash Set
Hashing Applications: Two Sum, Group Anagrams, Subarray Sum Problems
Strings: Pattern Matching (KMP, Rabin-Karp)
Strings: Palindromes, Anagrams, Frequency Maps
Backtracking: Subsets, Combinations, N-Queens, Sudoku Solver
Recursion: Tower of Hanoi, Generating Permutations/Combinations
Binary Trees (BT): Representation, Traversals (Inorder, Preorder, Postorder - Recursive/Iterative)
Binary Search Trees (BST): Insertion, Deletion, Validation, LCA, Kth Smallest
Heaps: Min/Max Heap Implementation and Heap Sort
Priority Queue Applications (K-th Largest, Merge K Sorted Lists)
Tries (Prefix Trees): Insert, Search, Delete, Word Suggestions
Graphs: Adjacency List/Matrix Representation
Graphs: BFS and DFS Traversal
Topological Sort (Kahnâ€™s Algorithm and DFS Method)
Cycle Detection in Graphs (Directed & Undirected)
Disjoint Set Union (Union-Find) with Path Compression and Rank
Shortest Path Algorithms: Dijkstra, Bellman-Ford, Floyd-Warshall
Minimum Spanning Trees: Primâ€™s and Kruskalâ€™s Algorithms

phases.focus: Dynamic Programming, Greedy, Divide & Conquer, and Advanced Problems
topics: Dynamic Programming Basics: Memoization vs Tabulation
DP Patterns: 1D DP, 2D DP, and State Optimization
DP Classic Problems: Fibonacci, Climbing Stairs, House Robber, Coin Change, LCS, LIS, 0/1 Knapsack
Matrix DP: Minimum Path Sum, Unique Paths, Edit Distance
Greedy Algorithms: Activity Selection, Huffman Coding, Job Sequencing
Divide and Conquer: Merge Sort, Quick Sort, Binary Search Variants
Bitmasking and Subset DP
Mathematical Algorithms: Fast Exponentiation, Modular Inverse
Prefix Function & Z-Algorithm for String Matching
Game Theory Basics (Nim Game, Grundy Numbers)
Segment Tree and Fenwick Tree (BIT) for Range Queries
Union-Find Applications: Kruskal, Connected Components
Top Interview Problems Mix: Trapping Rain Water, Rotate Image, Merge Intervals

phases.focus: Scalable Structures and Problem Solving for Competitive/Interview Use
topics: Advanced Trees: AVL, Red-Black, and Binary Indexed Trees
Graphs: Strongly Connected Components (Kosarajuâ€™s / Tarjanâ€™s Algorithm)
Graphs: Bridges and Articulation Points
Trie + Bit Manipulation Problems (Maximum XOR Pair)
Advanced Sliding Window (Variable Length, Distinct Characters)
Monotonic Stack and Monotonic Queue Patterns
Reservoir Sampling and Randomized Algorithms
Advanced DP: DP on Trees, DP with Bitmask, DP on Subsequences
Advanced Greedy and Interval Scheduling
Mathematical Optimization and Combinatorics in Problems
